rows.label: tlk42200241_04_msg0001
rows.name: Something incredible has happened in Alst, mo!

rows.label: tlk42200241_04_msg0002
rows.name: This is a lucky turn of events, mo!

rows.label: tlk42200241_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Haruru knows full well that saying this
is insensitive, mo.

rows.label: tlk42200241_04_msg0004
rows.name:
But the time has finally come when Invidia and Superbia
must cooperate, mo.

rows.label: tlk42200241_04_msg0005
rows.name:
That means the opportunity for Haruru to move
to Superbia has finally arrived, mo.

rows.label: tlk42200241_04_msg0006
rows.name:
I'm going to disguise myself as a refugee
and enter Superbia, mo!

rows.label: tlk42200241_04_msg0007
rows.name: Hah, things are going to get busy from now on, mo.
